/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling construction site in the heart of Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering cranes and buildings that dominate the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the construction site. Power lines crisscross above, adding another layer of complexity to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and brown, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
